text: Leungo Scotch (born 28 February 1996) is a Botswanan sprinter. He set a new personal best of 45.27s to win the men's 400 metres event at 2019 African Games in Rabat. ==References== ==External links== *IAAF Athlete’s profile Category:Botswana male sprinters Category:African Games gold medalists for Botswana Category:African Games medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2019 African Games Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:African Games gold medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:African Games competitors for Botswana
title: Leungo Scotch
